document.full_text: u.s. securities regulators proposed new rules on wednesday designed to restore lending discipline, and to bolster the independence of compensation committees at public companies and the consultants who serve them.
document.title: sec proposes risk retention, pay consultancy rules
lines_and_colors: u.s. securities regulators proposed new rules on wednesday designed to restore lending discipline, and to bolster the independence of compensation committees at public companies and the consultants who serve them.
